explains: n. 审计员；听众；<美>旁听生
wordGroup: independent auditor 独立审计师；独立审计员

sentences.en: An external auditor will verify the accounts.
sentences.cn: 外部审计员将核实这些账目。

sentences.en: The auditor has questioned the legality of the contracts.
sentences.cn: 审计员已经质疑合同的合法性。

sentences.en: During several years of gambling in that casino, Williams, a state auditor earning ＄35000 a year, lost approximately ＄175000.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯是一名年薪3.5万美元的州审计员，他在那家赌场赌了好几年，输了大约17.5万美元。
